titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material for "Sonification for Process Monitoring in Highly Sensitive Surgical Tasks"

mods.abstract:
This research data publication contains supplementary material for the paper "Sonification for Process Monitoring in Highly Sensitive Surgical Tasks" (see Links). The videos show the delta time series together with moving averages. Nine different sound designs
### Video examples
#### Natural Soundscape Sonification
##### **V1--NSS-1** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V1.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
##### **V2--NSS-2** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V2.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
##### **V3--NSS-3** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V3.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
#### Data-driven Algorithmic Composition
##### **V4--DDAC-1** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V4.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
##### **V5--DDAC-2** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V5.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
##### **V6--DDAC-3** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V6.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
####Combined Soundscapes & Synthetic Information Streams
##### **V7--CSSIS-1** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V7.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
##### **V8--CSSIS-2** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V8.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
##### **V9--CSSIS-3** <center><video controls preload="auto" ><source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2938433/2938439/V9.mp4"></video><center> see article for further details.
